title: AIM Centre RMIT: student work 1995-1996
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: 1995: The Pied Piper (Alastair MacInnes 1 min.)--Dust (incomplete - no details available)--Spaghetti western (Chris Hancock, Marco Bresciani, 6 min.)--The Rainy night... (John Power, Sharon Parker 2 min.)--Mayday (John Power, 5 min.)--The Chase (Gillian Morrison, 4 min.)--This is not my city (John Sharpe, 1 min.) --This way up (Sharon Parker, 3 min.)--Killjoy (Alastair MacInnes, 3 min.) --Apoidea (Alan Dorin, 5 min.)--From the ladle to the grave (Chris Hancock, 5 min.)--Shift (John Power, 9 min.)--Silent voices (John Sharpe, 2 min.)--Penguins off the page (John Rowdon, 8 min.). 1996: Tightrope (1 min.)--Ache (2 min.)--November 1957 (Lindsay Mark, 1 min.)--The Incredibly low resolution adventures of cyberkid (Kathryn Mew, 9 mins.)--The True tale of Maud and Flossy (Eva Lee, 8 mins.)--Miss Showy (Ai Yen Hoe, 3 mins.)--Nolene Giblet's Big Snatch ( Susan Earl, 13 mins.)--Pig too far gone (Greg Harbour, 9 mins.)--Can you hear the dog Fernando (Philippa McDermott, 5 mins.).
description: Episode of Series "RMIT Collection". For more information on AIM student works go to: http://minyos.its.rmit.edu.au/~rpyjp/AIMmain.html
